title: Multi-Currency Guide
author: Ekobol Team
intro: Show prices in your customers' local currencies to boost international sales. Ekobol automatically updates exchange rates and simplifies your global expansion.
p1: Multi-currency allows you to sell products in different currencies. Customers see prices in their local currency, which increases conversion rates.
li1: Higher conversion rates - customers prefer shopping in their local currency
li2: Global expansion - enter new markets without currency barriers
li3: Automatic exchange rates - prices stay up-to-date

faq1_a: Clear the product cache in Settings → Advanced → Clear Cache.

faq3_a: Exchange rates may have changed between display and payment. This is normal.
